Directions: In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs, brown sugar, milk and oil. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, baking soda and nutmeg; add to egg mixture and mix well. Stir in the chips, oats, carrots and raisins. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray; flatten slightly. Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-13 minutes or until golden brown. Remove to wire racks to cool.
